name: Your Name
title: Full Stack Web Developer (Fresher)
background: A motivated fresher looking to start a career as a Full Stack Web Developer. Passionate about crafting responsive, user-friendly web applications and building real-world projects that combine clean UI design with performance and usability.

projects.name: Project Name
projects.description: Brief description of what your project does
projects.impact: Impact or results of the project

weaknesses.weakness: Sometimes take more time perfecting UI details
weaknesses.solution: I'm learning to balance perfection with productivity. I now set time limits for design iterations and focus on delivering functional, good-looking UIs within deadlines while maintaining quality.

leetcode.description: Solved more than 150 problems on LeetCode, mainly using Python. Also practiced problem-solving in Java and SQL to strengthen my programming fundamentals and database skills.

careerGoals.shortTerm: Start my career as a Full Stack Web Developer and contribute to building innovative web applications.
careerGoals.fiveYearGoal: Grow into a senior role and mentor junior developers while working on impactful projects.

questionsForInterviewer: What does the onboarding process look like?
What type of work will I be doing in this role?
What opportunities are there for growth and learning?
What does a typical day look like for developers in your team?
